abstract: Hey everyone! If you enjoyed this video, please subscribe for more travel and lifestyle vlogs! I've visited everywhere from Hong Kong, Seoul, Taiwan, Thailand, Santorini, Croatia, Switzerland to Cancun and you can expect a ton of FOOD, culture and exploring. Hope to see you there! Love Shu :)
i love to see my beautiful city through the eyes of a tourist! it makes me realize how lucky i am to call this place my home 😍
I enjoyed watching your video. My family and I recently got back from a 3 week vacation in Europe where we spent time in Rome exploring the sites. It was amazing. We can't wait to go back!
